name: Whiteboard
description: My attempts on the office whiteboard. These little art attempts kept my juices running. They kept me in touch with my artistic side.

name: Project Skin
description: One of my fun projects. The main aim was to create a skin for my laptop, everything else just fell into place.

name: Landscapes
description: My first attempts at serious digital paintings.

name: Moods
description: The Sky is much more than just a blue background.

name: Raise the Dead
description: Here I detail out on what went through to envision and draw the Necromancer from Warcraft: Frozen Throne.  I captured all the intermediate stages so that the reader can relive at what went through to create this.

name: Avatars
description: All my different avatars that I had created.  From way early days when I first started to draw digitally.  You will find how the avatars evolved from my early feeble attempts.

name: First Digital Comics
description: My first attempt on a digital comics.

name: Project Etch
description: Here I put out the characters that I had done to be later etched onto my laptop.

name: Third Digital Comics
description: My third attempt on a digital comics.
